author.summary: I am a fullstack JavaScript Developer from Dhaka, Bangladesh. I love to work with Node, React, MySQL, MongoDB and all other related technologies. When I am not coding, I like to read books, do gardening and spend time with my family and friends.

nodes.metaDescription: Following are some of my open-source projects. If you want to contribute,  follow the given links. You can find contribution guides for each project on the project's readme.
nodes.title: Projects

contents.name: Book Manager
contents.description: A simple personal library management application built with Electron, React, and NeDB.

contents.name: bangla-calendar
contents.description: A small JavaScript library to convert any valid JavaScript date to Bangla date.

contents.name: prozuktischool.com
contents.description: An open source blogging platform built with Gatsby for Bangladeshi programmers.

contents.name: Deskaide
contents.description: An electron based desktop application to help managing pc usage.

contents.name: prayertiming-cli
contents.description: A command line tool to show Muslim prayer times based on coordinates.

contents.name: gatsby-theme-open-sourcerer
contents.description: A configurable minimal gatsby portfolio theme for open source developers.
